test/demoSystem/cfg/fuConsumer.py

00001 import FWCore.ParameterSet.Config as cms
00002 
00003 process = cms.Process("FUEVENTCONSUMER")
00004 
00005 process.maxEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( input = cms.untracked.int32(-1) )
00006 
00007 process.options = cms.untracked.PSet(wantSummary = cms.untracked.bool(True),
00008                                      makeTriggerResults = cms.untracked.bool(True),
00009                                      Rethrow = cms.untracked.vstring('ProductNotFound',
00010                                                                      'TooManyProducts',
00011                                                                      'TooFewProducts')
00012                                      )
00013 
00014 process.MessageLogger = cms.Service("MessageLogger",
00015                                     destinations = cms.untracked.vstring('cout'),
00016                                     cout = cms.untracked.PSet(threshold = cms.untracked.string('FATAL')),
00017                                     log4cplus = cms.untracked.PSet(threshold = cms.untracked.string('INFO'))
00018                                     )
00019 
00020 process.source = cms.Source("EventStreamHttpReader",
00021                             sourceURL = cms.string('http://srv-C2D05-05:51001/urn:xdaq-application:lid=30'),
00022                             consumerName = cms.untracked.string('Consumer FUEP'),
00023                             consumerPriority = cms.untracked.string('normal'),
00024                             headerRetryInterval = cms.untracked.int32(3),
00025                             maxEventRequestRate = cms.untracked.double(0.1),
00026                             SelectEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( SelectEvents = cms.vstring('*DQM') ),
00027                             SelectHLTOutput = cms.untracked.string('out4DQM'),
00028                             maxConnectTries = cms.untracked.int32(1)
00029                             )
00030 
00031 process.contentAna = cms.EDAnalyzer("EventContentAnalyzer")
00032 
00033 #process.p = cms.Path(process.contentAna)
